title: Frequency of American families having dinner together at home 2013
summary: As of early 2013 , 0_to_3_nights and 4_to_5_nights were the most families having dinner together home 2013 that 0_to_3_nights , followed by 4_to_5_nights and 6_to_7_nights .
Of respondents stated that they 6_to_7_nights 53 % watched 4_to_5_nights at 28 million British pounds each 4_to_5_nights .
